Package org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports

this package contains the NiReports core classes and interfaces.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DatedCell
    an interface specifying that a cell has a date which can be filtered upon by either (in)equality or ordering relation
    NiCurrency
    schema-independent way of specifying a currency in NiReports.
    NiFilters
    This interface is the NiReports faucet of filtering, e.g.
    NiPrecisionSetting
    an interface which governs the way precision is handled in a given NiReport.
    NumberedCell
    a Cell which contains a number.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractReportsSchema
    an abstract NiReportsSchema which contains utility methods for defining a schema in a coder-friendly way while ensuring reasonable safeguards for correctness.
    AmountCell
    a cell with an amount, with no coordinates or metadata
    BasicFiltersConverter
    a NiFilters converter which does the job (through subclasses, if necessary) in Basic or AMP-like filtering schemas.
    CategAmountCell
    the most widely instantiated cell in NiReports - the one holding "funding" (e.g.
    Cell
    an immutable piece of data used for the disaggregated phases of the report.
    ComparableValue<V>
    a class which pairs together a value (payload) and a comparable token (used for ordering values only).
    DateCell
    a Cell which holds a date.
    DoubleCell  
    GrandTotalsDigest
    a visitor which digests the values of a given trailCell
    IdValuePair
    a "synonym" for ImmutablePair
    ImmutablePair<K,V>
    an immutable Tuple(2) of unrelated values, conventionally called "k" and "v".
    IntCell
    a Cell holding a long value.
    MonetaryAmount
    immutable representation of a transaction.
    NiHeaderInfo
    the header layout of a NiReport.
    NiReportsEngine
    The NiReports engine API-independent entrypoint.
    NiReportsEngineForTesting  
    NiUtils
    utility classes for use across NiReports
    NumberedCellTest
    Test NumberCell compareTo method
    PassiveNiFilters
    a passive NiFilters instance.
    PercentageTextCell
    A Cell which holds a text and a fractional number called "percentage".
    RawDataDigest  
    ReportHeadingCell
    IMMUTABLE class holding information regarding a single cell of a rasterized Column, please keep it as such! This is the NiReports API equivalent of the ReportsAPI ReportCell
    ReportHierarchiesCollapser
    a visitor which implements the instructions contained in ReportCollapsingStrategy.
    TestcasesReportsSchema  
    TextCell
    a Cell which holds a text.
    TrailCellsDigest
    a visitor which digests the values of a given trailCell
    TranslatedDate
    a class which is used for stored the result of translating a LocalDate into some schema-specific calendar and then stripping the "day of month" part Calendars can inflict any type of change to a date, including: renaming months shifting months (so that, for example, September is the first month of the year) have years with a non-12 number-of-months have years with a "non-number number".

Package org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports Description

this package contains the NiReports core classes and interfaces. The central class and entrypoint is NiReportsEngine
Unless client code needs to access internals of the reporting engine after the report is done with (like the state of the engine, the fetched cells etc), one would normally access the engine via NiReportExecutor, which allows one to specify an "output builder".
An output builder is an instance of NiReportOutputBuilder which allows one to extract and transform whichever part of the output the client code is interested in. No schema-specific (e.g. AMP-specific) code should go in this package., as it might be extracted for other projects
